entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
